# Semi Automatic Dough Divider/Rounder

###### Main Benefits

  * Only one labor needed to operate, labor cost reducing
  * Realize dividing and rounding of the paste at the same time
  * Even rounding for buns of same weight and texture
  * Simple operation with forming round doughs at one time
  * Small footprint occupies little space

Category: Dough Divider

Contact Our Specialists

X

#### Overview

# Semi Automatic Dough Divider/Rounder

Making doughs is not an easy affair for everybody, however, our VER **semi
automatic dough divider rounder** makes dough dividing an easy and pleasant
work. This dough divider is designed to portion whole raw dough into
30-36pieces, rolling each ball into uniform shape with same weight. You could
taste delicious delicious dessert or breads in in a matter of seconds.

Only one labor needed to operate this small semi automatic dough divider
rounder makes it a small investment in bakery business that makes everyone
affordable. Ideal for even the smallest size bakery shop with counter space,
this dough divider could form doughs into 30-110g per pieces with three
different sizes oscillating plates, that could reach 4600 pieces of doughs per
hour.

#### Videos

#### Features

  * Product weight range from 30-110g
  * Choice for 3 molds with capacity ranging 30&36 divisions
  * Simple one-person operation reduces labour costs
  * Shaping chamber, cutting blade and division grids all made by stainless steel
  * All parts touch dough are made of stainless steel, met with HACCP



#### Specifications

  * Model

#### FAQ

### Why should I order one semi-automatic dough rounder?

  * VER Semi automatic dough divider is fit for making various doughs, such as bread and bun dough, pizza dough, and tortilla dough;
  * This semi automatic dough rounder could reach dividing and rounding of the paste at the same time, getting round uniform shape with same weight at no time, which could largely save labor costing big time;
  * All parts touch dough are made of stainless steel, met with HACCP and food grade, which will ensure the most hygiene working process.

### Is it easy to operate this semi automatic dough divider rounder?

The semi automatic dough divider is very simple for dough bun dividing, whole
process will cost only a few seconds.

  * Put your forming plate with doughs into oscillating plate
  * Getting same portioning by releasing the handle
  * Push the round handle to round perfection for the dough

### Is it difficult to clean the semi automatic dough divider?

This machine is very easy to make cleaning, for all parts could be taken part
easily.

  * Head could remove easy without any tools, you could make daily cleaning very easy
  * Head assemble whole body could be put into water for wash
  * Easy disassemble dough knife makes easily cleaning.

### What is the lead time for one-unit semi-automatic dough divider rounder?

On an average, we ask for 15-20 working days to deliver the product once the
payment is received. It is better to consult with us in prior, so we can give
you an accurate or approximate time line.

### What after sale services may I get for this semi automatic dough divider?

  * 12 month warranty offered
  * 7*24 hours life long time online technical support
  * Delivery with operation manual and trained video
  * Engineers available overseas

#### INTERESTING? REACH US TO GET Semi Automatic Dough Divider/Rounder PRICE
NOW!
